thread.title: Maldives leader Yameen Abdul Gayoom appeals for calm after his deputy’s arrest
thread.title_full: Maldives leader Yameen Abdul Gayoom appeals for calm after his deputy’s arrest

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: Maldives leader Yameen Abdul Gayoom appeals for calm after his deputy’s arrest
text:
Comments 
Male, Oct 25: The president of the Maldives has appealed for calm in the wake of the arrest of his deputy on suspicion of links to what authorities call an assassination attempt and says the decision was made in the best interests of the country. ( read: Haiti votes for new president amid security concerns) 
President Yameen Abdul Gayoom today spoke to some media about the arrest of Vice-President Ahmed Adeeb, which came yesterday after he returned from an official visit to China. Police took him directly to a detention center from the airport Gayoom was unhurt when an explosion went off on his speedboat on September 28 as he was traveling to the capital from the airport at the end of a hajj pilgrimage to Saudi Arabia. (image credit: twitter) 
  25, 2015 8:50 PM Topics:
